metadata.title: CVE-2021-43315 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer overflows was discovered in upx, during the genericpointer 'p' points to an inaccessible address in func get_le32(). Theproblem is essentially caused in PackLinuxElf32::elf_lookup() atp_lx_elf.cpp:5349

criterions.comment: upx-ucl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
